Sriya

Korean: 스리야

Hometown:

Jharsuguda, Odisha

Country:

India

Full name:
Shreya Lenka
Native name:
श्रेया लेंका
Birthday:
Sep 15, 2003
Age:
21 years old
Height:
5'7" (170 cm)
Group (2020-present):
BLACKSWAN

Introduction

Sriya is an Indian singer who works under DR Music. She is the youngest member of the multinational girl group BLACKSWAN.

She joined the group in May 2022 after passing the 2022 Cygnus Project global auditions.

DR Music:
Jan 26, 2022-present
Debut:
May 19, 2023
Current state:
active

MBTI:

Fun facts

1
Sriya is the first Indian k-pop idol.
…
2
Before joining BLACKSWAN, Sriya had a youtube channel where she posted vocal covers and dance videos.
…
3
One of her friends suggested to Sriya that she should apply for K-Pop auditions.
…
4
Sriya decided to build on her K-pop dream after she watched the video of EXO "Growl" and tried to copy the members’ moves.
…
5
It was her grandmother who found her a Hindustani classical music teacher for her to train under. She attended his classes twice a week but only really learned Western vocals by herself through watching online videos.
…
6
Sriya is trained in several dance styles, including Odissi classical form, freestyle, hip-hop and contemporary.
…
7
She learned Korean online and by watching lots of Korean dramas to strengthen her grasp of Korean language and culture.
…
8
In 2020, Sriya started auditioning for K-pop groups.
…
9
Sriya learned the Indian classical dance form Odissi for a year and a half.
…
10
She had to drop a year of school after her class 10 examinations in 2020 due to COVID-19.
…
